```{r}
#install packages and set up the data
install.packages("ggplot2")
install.packages("dbplyr")
library(ggplot2)
library(dbplyr)
data <- read.csv("Fruit-Prices-2022.csv")
head(data)
```


```{r}
#What is the price of eache variable

data %>% select(Fruit, RetailPrice, RetailPriceUnit)

priceperunit_per_fruit <- data %>% ggplot(aes(x = Fruit, y = RetailPrice)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, size = 7, vjust = 1, hjust = 1))

```
